00017 W.BigInteger = function(number){var self = this;
00018   var MAX = 999999999999999;  // 15-9
00019   // elements: 15-digit numbers
00020   this.lostPrecision = false;
00021   this.sign = true; // plus
00022   this.data = new Array;
00023   // argument precondition check
00024   if(typeof number == 'number' && number > MAX){
00025     number += '';  // type conversion
00026     this.lostPrecision = true;
00027   }
00028 
00029   // constructors
00030   switch(typeof number){
00031     // constructor w/ integer(number) argument
00032     case 'number':
00033       this.data[0] = number;
00034       break;
00035     // constructor w/ string argument
00036     case 'string':
00037       while(number.length > 15){
00038         this.data[this.data.length] = parseInt(number.substr(number.length
00039             - 16, number.length - 1));
00040         number = number.substr(0, number.length - 16);
00041       }
00042       this.data[this.data.length] = parseInt(number);
00043       break;
00044     // default constructor
00045     default:
00046       this.data[0] = 0;
00047   }
00048 
00049   // set/get current value
00050   this.value = function(setValue){
00051     if(typeof setValue != 'undefined'){
00052       var temp = new W.BigInteger(setValue);
00053       this.data = temp.data;
00054       return temp.value;
00055     }
00056     if(this.data.length == 1 && this.data[0] == 0) return '0';
00057     var result = '';
00058     for(var i = this.data.length - 1; i >= 0 ; --i){
00059       // print place holding '0'
00060       if(this.data[i] == 0)
00061         result += '000000000000000';
00062       else result += this.data[i] + '';
00063     }
00064     return result;
00065   };
00066 
00067   this.add = function(source){
00068     if(typeof source == 'number') source += '';
00069     var source = new W.BigInteger(source);
00070     var result = new W.BigInteger;
00071     result.data.pop();  // empty data holder
00072     var bigger = this.data;
00073     var numElements = this.data.length;
00074     if(source.data.length < numElements)
00075       numElements = source.data.length;
00076     else bigger = source.data;
00077 
00078     var carry = 0;
00079     for(var i = 0; i < numElements; ++i){
00080       var value = this.data[i] + source.data[i] + carry;
00081       // compute the carry
00082       if(value > MAX){
00083         carry = Math.floor(value / ((MAX + 1) * 10));
00084         //alert('orig_value:'+ value +', value:'+ (value % ((MAX + 1) * 10)) +', carry:'+ carry);
00085         value %= (MAX + 1) * 10;
00086       }else carry = 0;
00087       result.data.push(Math.floor(value));
00088     }
00089 
00090     // handle left-over carry
00091     if(numElements == bigger.length){
00092       if(carry != 0)
00093         result.data.push(carry);
00094     }else{
00095       // handle upper elements
00096       for(var i = numElements; i < bigger.length; ++i){
00097         value = parseInt(bigger[i]);
00098         // handle left-over carry
00099         if(i == numElements)
00100           value += carry;
00101         result.data.push(value);
00102       }
00103     }
00104 
00105     this.data = result.data;
00106     return result;
00107   }
00108 
00109   this.mul = function(times){
00110     var temp = this.value();
00111     for(var i = 1; i < times; ++i)
00112       this.add(temp);
00113     return this;
00114   };
00115 
00116   this.pow = function(num){
00117     for(var i = 0; i < num; ++i){
00118       var temp = this.value();
00119       this.mul(temp);
00120     }
00121     return this;
00122   };
00123   this.toString = function(){return this.value();};
00124 };
